title: Govbot Configuration Schema
description: Schema for validating govbot.yml configuration files

repos.description: List of repositories to clone and process. Use 'all' to include all available repositories.

tags.description: Tag definitions for categorizing legislation. Each tag should have a description and optional examples.

base_url.description: Base URL for RSS feed links (required for GitHub Pages). Should match your GitHub Pages URL.

output_dir.description: Directory where RSS feeds are generated

output_file.description: Output filename for the RSS feed

tags.description: Specific tags to include in the combined RSS feed. If not specified, all tags are included.

title.description: Custom feed title. If not specified, defaults to combined tag names.

description.description: Custom feed description. If not specified, defaults to combined tag descriptions.

limit.description: Limit number of entries per RSS feed. Use 'none' for no limit, or a number. Default is 15 (RSS standard).

description.description: Detailed description of what legislation this tag covers. Use YAML multiline strings (|) for formatting.

examples.description: Example bill descriptions that would match this tag
